website_summaries.verdict: Compact, vibrantly patterned, and easily linked together to form a super-train, this 30-pack of mini engines is a solid deal, especially if you already have a train track at home.
pros: Includes 30 miniature tank engines of Thomas and his friends
A wide range of eye-catching colors and designs
cons: These are much smaller than the wooden train toys

customer_reviews.title: Thomas fun
customer_reviews.text: It's Thomas the train x 30. So your kid wants Thomas for Christmas and this train set would work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Potty Training
customer_reviews.text: We used these to motivate my three year old son to use the potty. It took a couple of days for him to understand the reward system, but worked so well after that. He loves showing friends and neighbors his train "for pooping on the potty" and carries one just about everywhere he goes. He was fully potty trained within 3 weeks (after about half the box), and was so excited to pick which train design he wanted each time. We started at the beginning of December, and he got the last train at the start of February. Highly recommend if you're looking to try something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Mechburg34

customer_reviews.title: Good for a new collector.
customer_reviews.text: This set arrived incredibly fast, 8 days earlier than the estimate. It contains a good mix of characters and designs, providing me with 8 new ones to add to my collection. The remainder were duplicates to me, having acquired them in blind bags. For the collector just starting out, its a good way to get a mix quickly. The beach designs are cute, and it was good to see two of the exclusives had different printing on each side, something that has been lacking on recent releases.
customer_reviews.author: sunhuntin

customer_reviews.title: The Modern Kid's Micro Machines
customer_reviews.text: My three year old kid loves Thomas and Friends minis, and this is a huge bunch of them at a great price. He loves to get them out, figure out which ones they all are, and then line them up and link them together. I remember I had Micro Machines as a kid - half the fun was just playing with something so small. These are both fun to play with and fun to talk about. Can't say enough about how great these things are.
customer_reviews.author: The Huntington Book Depository

customer_reviews.title: Great for potty training rewards
customer_reviews.text: At the time of my purchase the price was the best value for these mini trains, so I purchased this set. My toddler loved receiving them as potty training rewards as an alternative to candy! They are great to bring along in an activity bag while traveling and he loves looking at the designs on each train and linking them all together and pulling them around the table.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Blum

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: They're adorable, but... see anything wrong with this? It's supposed to be a 30 pack but there are 2 missing from the package...
customer_reviews.author: Allison Heckman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birthday Party Favor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 2 year old's Train birthday party as part of the party favor bags! The age on these says 3+ (which I believe is because they are so tiny) so I just monitor him when playing with them. All the other kids at his party were over 3 so I didn't see an issue with it. My son loved all the different colors and loved picking which ones he wanted to keep! We also ended up taking these on a 1 night trip as one of his toys to play with in the hotel! They are so tiny which makes them super portable!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Can’t play. Come off real easy when connect together.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really small (about 1 each long). Also, they are so easy to come off when connect together. I wish the stick that connect the carts together could be higher (longer) so my sons can play. Threw away the box, not worth to return. My sons didn’t show any more interest to these train.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Luong

customer_reviews.title: Great variety and great price
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to be a part of the party favors for my son’s 3rd birthday and they worked out great! The variety was great and the kids loved picking out their own trains!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old obsessed with trains and these were the perfect size! Didn’t have to worry about him damaging anything “driving” them all over our house. And appreciate there were enough that his younger sister could grab a few and play along without a total meltdown...worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves these trains!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves these trains! He has one in his hand everywhere we go! I got an amazing price for how many trains you get. At the store 3 of these trains are normally around 6.00 or more. This would make a great gift for any kiddo who loves trains!
customer_reviews.author: katie stewart

customer_reviews.title: Thomas the Train Fan
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son has fallen in love with these mini trains and we love that there were so many. We love the different designs and colors used. The only con is that the trains don't stay connected to one another for long and come apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S

customer_reviews.title: Great product, kids loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this on Christmas morning and they are stilll in tact a month later. Great christmas gift and wonderful value, much more expensive at walmartGreat product for money and kids loved it
customer_reviews.author: Brittany.S

customer_reviews.title: SO cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my nephew's birthday. He loved the assortment. Loved that they will be easy to pack when we travel together for vacation. Cute and durable.
customer_reviews.author: kcmommy03

customer_reviews.title: Mini trains for toddler
customer_reviews.text: My four year old daughter as just gotten into liking trains. She loves these trains and plays with them often.
customer_reviews.author: Tan Dunks

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great for a 3 yo gift. He loved it. Trains are very small so not for kids who out things in their mouths
customer_reviews.author: clint harrison

customer_reviews.title: Super teeny tiny but cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute but teeny tiny. 4 year old loves them but a definite choking hazard for toddlers. These are not regular minis. They are about 1/3 the size of a mini.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Davies

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, cute set
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute set for a little one. The price is much better than in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Lor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my great grandsons. They loved them! Also got the carrying case for them.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old son loves his Thomas and Friends minis. Keeps him busy for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam L.

customer_reviews.title: Gma rocks!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is obsessed with Thomas and loved this set. Gma win!
customer_reviews.author: Gma

customer_reviews.title: Super duper deal!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our little train loving toddler! Hurts way less to step on than hot wheels and legos!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: DESTROYED PACKAGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the package!!! The box it came in was fine so they put the train box in knowing it was destroyed. Not Happy!!! How and I give this as a gift?!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Tylor

customer_reviews.title: very cheap and small
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because they are very cheap and small. It's better to save your money and just buy bigger versions of the used Thomas the trains.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Kwok

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use for my son's Advent calendar this year. Each one was really cute and made well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is obsessed with Thomas trains and these minis are perfect for him to take everywhere. Price is just right and they have held up to a 2yrold perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Karowski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toys!
customer_reviews.text: My son approves and loves it! He was it on YouTube and I’m glad I found it here!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Trains, Badly Damaged Box
customer_reviews.text: The trains themselves are nice but the box was badly torn up and covered in tape by someone trying to tape it back together. Definitely not giftable.
customer_reviews.author: MPontes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a Christmas gift for a major T&F fan!
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Mischievous
customer_reviews.text: We love the minis! All the different characters are fun to play with and they can get into all kinds of trouble. Fun to make backgrounds for ocean minis, school minis, and so on.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Choice 4 A Thomas Lover.
customer_reviews.text: My Son Loves This... Thank You Amazon & Seller.... Beautiful & Vibrant Trains.... PERFECT for my 7 yr old...
customer_reviews.author: AL-IDANI Family

customer_reviews.title: A Real Hit!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this train set to my six-year-old nephew, who is on the autism spectrum. He loves to line things up and is obsessed with this darling 30-car mini train. The train cars are colorful and decorated with various animals.
customer_reviews.author: Pat in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Fisher-Price Thomas & Friends MINIS, 30-Pack
customer_reviews.text: cute, and easy for little 2 yr old fingers to manipulate
customer_reviews.author: joan kuc

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my great nephew. He love these
customer_reviews.author: louellen zarembski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo just can’t get snuff Thomas! This was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2T&J&V

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: They don’t stay connected very easily. Can be frustrating for a young child. But, they are so cute and a great size for playmates.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Scherrbaum

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my som for Christmas. Great gift, he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: DreCastillo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with Thomas the trains I got this for him Christmas and he absolutely loves it they work on all the tracks and the motorized mini tracks very cute gift.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Forgeron

customer_reviews.title: Great durable
customer_reviews.text: He loves his trains ! At first I was buying these guys separate but I’m glad to know I can purchase them in a bundle .
customer_reviews.author: Termeakriss L Travis

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved it!! I got him the carrying case for them and he carries them all over the place!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great toys
customer_reviews.text: Great product...kids will love finding it in the Easter eggs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: Fun trains, tiny so it's good to have many of them
customer_reviews.author: shira

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Nice trains but not very good price is high and quality is not really good
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: They were really poor quality. I had to go out and buy a different Christmas gift to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathaleen L. Park

customer_reviews.title: Thomas Minis
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson was so happy to see so many different Minis. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my 6 year old and he love them!!
customer_reviews.author: ADRIANNE JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loved Them
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pack for my Grandson for his Birthday since he's a big Thomas fan. He really loved them and I also picked up the case for these minis that hold over 50 train cars so that he can keep them all in one place and neat.
customer_reviews.author: BlackHeartNY

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Thomas & Friends MINIS, 30-Pack
product_meta.description: ​These MINIS engines are full of fun! With colorful styles and designed to be rolled along at fast speeds, this assortment makes playtime an exciting experience for your child. Send these MINIS engines zooming across surfaces and tracks to see them in action! Best of all, this 30-pack comes with 3 special edition MINIS engines with beach-themed designs. Compatible with Thomas & Friends MINIS (sold separately and subject to availability).​
feature_bullets: ​Includes 30 MINIS each with its own special design
​Includes 3 Special Edition MINIS engines with beach-themed designs
​MINIS assortment includes trains like Neon Splatter Thomas, Monkey Percy and Camouflage Rosie

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars464 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
